aboutPage.title: My name is Néstor Acerbo. I'm from Argentina and a River Plate fan ❤.
aboutPage.text: I am a COBOL Analyst Programmer with solid experience in the financial sector, having worked with institutions such as AGIP and BBVA. I am passionate about technology and committed to continuous improvement and specialization in my field, always seeking new challenges that allow me to grow both professionally and personally.

skillsPage.subtitle: These are some of the technologies I have worked with:

workPage.subtitle: These are some of my recent projects:
workPage.textSportsManager: Freelance work made in Next.js which is a multistep form (wizard). It uses Context for state management, Reactstrap and Material-ui for UI tools. Formik + Yup for the form and validation. It uses next-translate for translations.
workPage.textCMYK: A tool for automated management of FrontEndCafé CMYK projects. Done as a group over the course of 2 months. It uses KeystoneJS as headlessCMS, connection to Knex and ApolloGraphQL. As React framework it uses Next.js. TailwindCSS for styles.
workPage.textMessage: This App is to send messages to WhatsApp numbers without having to add them to your contacts, mainly make this application to do this task in a easy way.
workPage.textMecanica: Responsive landing page for local business. Built with HTML5, Bootstrap4 and Netlify Forms to receive contact data, connected to Google Maps and Whatsapp.
workPage.textNotas: Web application to save notes simply and quickly. Built with Firebase, Bootswatch as a CSS tool.
workPage.textPokecommerce: Final project for the Coderhouse React course. E-commerce of pokemons with cart. Context is used to manage states, styles with React-Bootstrap and Firebase for the backend through API connection. For routing, react-router-dom was used.
workPage.textQuiz: Game application of questions and answers (quiz) in which we must answer the questions correctly. Made with ViteJS, React, Bootstrap 5 and Open Trivia API.
